title: Tour Hour (A travel website)
details: Its a Travelling Related Website,You can book various different countries tickets from here,& can get a relaxable trip with your family,There are various group packages for friends ,We can assure you that your journey will be perfect,safe & secure with us,We provide our services 24/7 hours.

title: Car Planet (Car dealing website)
details: This is car selling & buying website,we provide different types of cars of our customers,We provide 24/7 hour service for our customers,5 Years Servicing guarantee,Cars from low range to higher range,Different Catagories,New Model cars are here for our customers.

title: Heal & Cure (Online hospital service)
details: This is a hospital related website,You can take Appointment for our specialists,This is a website for emergency patience,You can also take online services here,We are 24/7 hours open for our beloved patience.

title: Coders Pro (An educational site)
details: This is a project about online courses,There are 13 types of courses there,Anyone can enroll in this course from anywhere of the world.

title: Good Food (Online food service)
details: Its a health care related service from here one can know about healthy food or can be inspired.Health is wealth and all of us should maintain healthy food for our healthy living.This is the main purpose of this website.

title: Football Club (Copa America 2021)
details: Its a football website,from here one can watch live match and suppoert his favourite team,One can also get information about everyday match and live telecast.

title: Honda CBR (Online bike dealing)
details: Its a website for bike buying and selling,One can buy it through online,Its a onlive platform from where one can buy a bike from home and can get home delivery.There are different catagories bikes collections.

title: App Store (A site for app)
details: This project is about most popular apps in worldwide,Its helps you to know about peoples choice about social media apps,There are 12apps information.

title: MacBook Pro (MacBook dealing site)
details: Its works like a calculator,it identifes the total cost of buying a macbook in differrent conditions.
